title: Himi 449
lyrics:
8.7.8.7. loua
(Ko Saame 72:10)
“’E ‘atu me’a’ofa ‘e he ng. tu’i
‘o Sipa mo Sapa.”
1.
Lau pē ‘e he Tohi Saame,
‘E ‘i ai ha ngaahi hau,
Te nau fakava’eva’e
Ki he lotu Tohitapu.
Ko e ngaahi Tu’i Sapa
Te nau takimu’a ai,
Lahi pē ‘enau paʻanga
Te nau ‘omi ‘o foak
i
.
2.
Hono taha ‘a e kuonga
Kuo mole atu ai,
Talu pē he folofola
Mo ‘ikai ha me’a ‘e fai!
Hiki pē ‘a e Tu’i Sapa,
Puli atu fuoloa:
Nofo hono kau tangata
‘I he potu ta’e’iloa.
3.
Ka ne ngāue pe ‘a e lotu
He fonua kehekeh
e
.
‘Ilo ‘i he ‘otu motu
‘A e fa’ahinga kuo hē.
Ngaahi Tu’i Sapa ia
Na’a nau nofo pē ‘i Tong
a
,
Fai mei Vaihi ki Neu-Sila,
Mei Tahisi ki Ha’amoa.
4.
‘Ikai ko e toki mana
Hono fai ‘e he ‘Otua.
Tala ‘a e ‘ulungaanga
Laui afe taʻu ‘i mu’a!
Taha he fonua ne laka,
‘O ‘ikai ha lea ki ai!
Tuhu ki he Tu’i Sapa,
Mo e ngāue te ne fai.
5.
Hono ‘ikai fakaofo
Hono fai ‘e he kakai!
Tonga kuo ongoongo
‘I he ‘enau fa’a foaki.
Hako ‘o e Tu’i Sapa,
Mou tu’u hake fiefia;
Fakaili ‘a e tauala,
Tali homou fatongia.*
